entry.title: 100 Lore & Story Secrets in Breath of the Wild

media:group.media:title: 100 Lore & Story Secrets in Breath of the Wild
media:group.media:description:
Let's look at a hundred little details and secrets that tell us more about Breath of the Wild's world and Hyrule's story.

Gameplay footage used:

entry.title: The Best Boss Battle in Every Zelda Game

media:group.media:title: The Best Boss Battle in Every Zelda Game
media:group.media:description:
What is EVERY Zelda game's best boss battle? From the original on the NES all the way through to Breath of the Wild on the Switch, here are my picks for every Zelda game's best boss fight!
►Follow me on Twitter! http://www.twitter.com/Zeltik or Instagram: @zeltikinsta ► Music in this video: Nintendo
Sources:
Zeldawiki: https://zelda.fandom.com/
Gameplay footage used:
OoA Ramrock Fight: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3VBeXHtVZHw OoS Gleeok Fight: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IL6_46oTcLI PH and ST from Archive64: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChI2IE-6YrYGDPfXvUIpdXg ALBW Stalblind footage: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fIfqyyYXdSI FS: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rvhn74pEa2M FSA: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bSI_oswB1Kc
All other footage not recorded by myself taken from ZeldaMaster (https://www.youtube.com/c/ZeldaMasterLuke) and ZorZelda (https://www.youtube.com/c/ZorZelda)
► Discord Link: https://discord.gg/zeltik ► Intro music by: http://bit.ly/RuvenWegner ► Outro music by Clangon: https://youtu.be/81eq8o6sMyo
0:00 Intro 1:17 The Legend of Zelda 2:10 Adventure of Link 3:04 A Link to the Past 3:48 Link's Awakening 4:33 Ocarina of Time 6:15 Majora's Mask 7:15 Oracle of Ages 8:08 Oracle of Seasons 8:42 Four Swords 9:38 The Wind Waker 11:09 The Minish Cap 12:05 Four Swords Adventures 13:17 Twilight Princess 14:35 Phantom Hourglass 15:18 Spirit Tracks 16:20 Skyward Sword 17:07 A Link Between Worlds 18:11 Tri Force Heroes 19:01 Breath of the Wild 21:56 Outro
